detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: Unlike many large recruitment firms, we work directly with you throughout the entire recruitment cycle. This boutique-like approach builds deeper individual relationships between our recruiters and our clients.

detailsData.title: Thorough Vetting
detailsData.content: We spend a considerable amount of time interviewing and getting to know the candidates. This ensures that they are a good fit in advance of client presentation.

detailsData.title: Strategic Partner
detailsData.content: We take the time to know the hiring managers and managing partners at many top firms. This allows us to speak intelligently with candidates about the roles we are representing and your firm.

detailsData.title: End-to-End Support
detailsData.content: We stay engaged and work with the client through the offer stage. This ensures a seamless process from start to finish.

valueProp: The Merker Group is a leading national recruiting firm. We work many of the top law firms across the nation. We also have clients that range from small start-ups to multinational corporations across all industries and sectors. The combination of our unique approach and our in depth knowledge of the legal market, along with actual experience practicing law, makes us the ideal choice for your next search.
